tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_locations; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_locations AS SELECT acvl.id, acvl.parent_location, acvl.location_name, getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Country') AS country_id, getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Country')) AS country_name, getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Region') AS region_id, getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Region')) AS region_name, getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Zone') AS zone_id, getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'Zone')) AS zone_name, getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'District') AS district_id, getlocationname(getlocationidbyimplloc(acvl.id, 'District')) AS district_name
FROM amp_category_value_location acvl
